title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: XLM Gains 1.5% as Index Inches Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) joined Stellar (XLM) as a top performer, rising 1.3% from Wednesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3248.93, up 0.4% (+14.12) since 4 p.m. on Wednesday.

Eleven of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: XLM (+1.5%) and LTC (+1.3%).

Laggards: APT (-1.0%) and UNI (-0.8%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index rose 0.4% with 11 of 20 assets trading higher, indicating overall positive market movement.
